review: Dr Avadesh is very polite while consultation.  He checks my baby very patiently and properly and is always ready to help or advise even after duty hours.

Great experience with the doctor, as always. Have been showing my son for last 3 years. ******* ********* *** *********** **** ** ***** ************ Very polite and patient. Highly recommended for the little ones, knowing they are in safe hands.
